title: Workshop on Utilizing AI Image Generation Tools for Landscape Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic landscape design concepts and smartphone proficiency
context.additional_context: Non-degree educational program for pre-service/in-service teachers, emphasizing design thinking training over an integrated approach with mathematics curriculum.

learning_goals: Learners can visualize landscape design concepts using three or more AI image generation tools (Adobe Firefly, Bing Image Creator, Midjourney).
Learners critically analyze generated AI images and propose two or more strategies for their application in the design process.
Learners develop prototypes applying generated images to actual landscape design projects through experiential learning activities.

resources: AI image generation web tool access permission
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
